scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && yarn run _copy.resources && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && yarn run _copy.resources && yarn run link && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.json -w
scripts._copy.package.json: node -p 'let json = require("./package.json"); json.peerDependencies = json.dependencies; delete json.dependencies; delete json.scripts; require("fs").writeFileSync("dist/package.json", JSON.stringify(json, undefined, 2));'
scripts.test: rm -rf dist/* && (mkdir dist || true) && yarn run _copy.resources && ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p tsconfig.json && ./node_modules/.bin/nyc --reporter=lcovonly mocha "./dist/**/*.spec.js"
